refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Main TS-key for all pt_extlist settings.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Holds configuration for all list identifiers configured by array key.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Holds configuration for a single list identifier

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: List default values.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The default sorting column while no other sortng ist set.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Holds the configuration for the used data backend.

refentry.refsection:
VariantsbackendConfig.mysql, backendConfig.typo3, backendConfig.extbase, Variants of backendConfig:backendConfig.mysqlbackendConfig.mysql Description
Typo3 Backend. Inherits the Features from the MySql Backend but the datasource is already configured. The Typo3 Backend handles enableFields automatically in where clauses.StdWrapPrototypeNOplugin.tx_ptextlist.prototype.backend.mysqlChild elementsdatasource, baseFromClause, baseWhereClause, baseGroupByClause, datasourcedatasource Description
StdWrapNObaseFromClausebaseFromClause Description
Holds the FROM clause of a mysql query without the FROM keyword.DatatypeStdWrapStringYES Example
static_countries LEFT JOIN static_territories AS st_subcontinent ON (static_countries.cn_parent_tr_iso_nr = st_subcontinent.tr_iso_nr) baseWhereClausebaseWhereClause Description
Holds the WHERE clause of a mysql query without the WHERE keyword.StdWrapNO Example
st_continent.tr_name_en [] '' baseGroupByClausebaseGroupByClause Description
Holds the GROUP BY clause of a mysql query without the GROUP BY keyword.DatatypeStdWrapStringYES Example
st_continentbackendConfig.typo3backendConfig.typo3 Description
Typo3 Backend. Inherits the Features from the MySql Backend but the datasource is already configured. The Typo3 Backend handles enableFields automatically in where clauses.StdWrapNO Example
" backendConfig < plugin.tx_ptextlist.prototype.backend.typo3 backendConfig { tables ( static_countries, static_territories st_continent, static_territories st_subcontinent )
baseFromClause ( static_countries LEFT JOIN static_territories AS st_subcontinent ON (static_countries.cn_parent_tr_iso_nr = st_subcontinent.tr_iso_nr) LEFT JOIN static_territories AS st_continent ON (st_subcontinent.tr_parent_iso_nr = st_continent.tr_iso_nr) )
baseWhereClause ( st_continent.tr_name_en <> '' AND st_subcontinent.tr_name_en <> '' ) } "Child elementstables, tablestables Description
'Enable fields where clauses' are applied to all tables given.DatatypePosible valuesStdWrapBoolean0,1NO Example
static_countries, static_territories st_continent backendConfig.extbasebackendConfig.extbase Description
Extbase Repository Backend.StdWrapPrototypeNOplugin.tx_ptextlist.prototype.backend.extbase

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Defines raw datasource fields, wich can than combined and processed in to table fields.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Named definition of a single data field.

refentry.refsection: Child elementstable, field, special, isSortable, expandGroupRows,

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The table, this field belongs to.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Name of the tables field.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Insert a individual SQL snippet.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Holds the tables column definitions.

refentry.refsection: Child elementsfieldIdentifier, label, renderUserFunctions, renderTemplate, renderObj, sorting, sortingImageAsc, sortingImageDesc, sortingImageDefault, accessGroups, cellCSSClass,

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Identifier of a defined field.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A label for this element.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A list of userfunctions to render the field value.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Holds the renderer configuration.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A list of chained renderer classes that work on list data structures. The default renderer class uses the column configuration, to render the list of field data in a list of rows and columns. By default this renderer iscalled at position 100. All defined renderer before 100 work on a field data list, while renderer after 100 work on a column list data structure.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Configuration of a single renderer.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The class name of the renderers php class.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Defines aggregates of data fields.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Named definition of a single data field.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Defined aggregate methods.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The scope for the aggregation can be either set to the current page or to the whole query. Aggregates for the current page are calculated internally without an additonal database query.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Holds the aggregates columns definitions.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Holds all filterbox configurations.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Show a reset link for all filters of this filterBox.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Show a submit button for this filterBox.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Holds the configuration of the filters of this filter box.

Shows a string filter.StdWrapPrototypeNOplugin.tx_ptextlist.prototype.filter.string Example
